   16: %%% limitations under the License.
   17: 
   18: -module(textgroup_SUITE).
   19: -compile(export_all).
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: 
   22: -type info() :: ct_suite:ct_info().
   23: -type config() :: ct_suite:ct_config().
   24: -type test_def() :: ct_suite:ct_test_def().
   25: -type test_name() :: ct_suite:ct_testname().
   26: -type group_def() :: ct_suite:ct_group_def().
   27: -type group_name() :: ct_suite:ct_groupname().
   28: 
   29: %% API.
   30: 
   31: -spec suite() -> [info()].
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{require, {host, [addr, port]}},
   34:      {timetrap, {seconds, 30}}].
   35: 
   36: -spec init_per_suite(config()) -> config().
   37: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   38:     Host = ct:get_config(host),
   39:     Addr = proplists:get_value(addr, Host),
   40:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Host),
   41:     [{addr, Addr}, {port, Port} | Config].
   42: 
   43: -spec end_per_suite(config()) -> ok.
   44: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   45:     ok.
   46: 
   47: -spec init_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> config().
   48: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: -spec end_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> ok.
   52: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   53:     ok.
   54: 
   55: -spec init_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> config().
   56: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: -spec end_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> ok.
   60: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: -spec groups() -> [group_def()].
   64: groups() ->
   65:     [].
   66: 
   67: -spec all() -> [test_def()] | {skip, term()}.
   68: all() ->
   69:     [start_server,
   70:      peers,
   71:      stats,
   72:      help,
   73:      stop_server].
   74: 
   75: %% Test cases.
   76: 
   77: -spec start_server(config()) -> any().
   78: start_server(Config) ->
   79:     ct:pal("Starting Textgroup server"),
   80:     Port = ?config(port, Config),
   81:     ok = application:set_env(textgroup, port, Port, [{persistent, true}]),
   82:     {ok, _Apps} = application:ensure_all_started(textgroup).
   83: 
   84: -spec peers(config()) -> any().
   85: peers(Config) ->
   86:     ok = query(Config, <<"peers">>, <<"127.0.0.1">>).
   87: 
   88: -spec stats(config()) -> any().
   89: stats(Config) ->
   90:     ok = query(Config, <<"stats">>, <<"Messages rcvd: 1">>).
   91: 
   92: -spec help(config()) -> any().
   93: help(Config) ->
   94:     ok = query(Config, <<"help">>, <<"quit">>).
   95: 
   96: -spec stop_server(config()) -> any().
   97: stop_server(_Config) ->
   98:     ct:pal("Stopping Textgroup server"),
   99:     ok = application:stop(textgroup).
  100: 
  101: %% Internal functions.
  102: 
  103: -spec connect(config()) -> gen_tcp:socket().
  104: connect(Config) ->
  105:     Addr = ?config(addr, Config),
  106:     Port = ?config(port, Config),
  107:     {ok, Socket} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port,
  108:                                    [binary,
  109:                                     {nodelay, true},
  110:                                     {active, false},
  111:                                     {packet, line}],
  112:                                    timer:seconds(5)),
  113:     Socket.
  114: 
  115: -spec query(config(), binary(), binary()) -> ok.
  116: query(Config, Query, Expected) ->
  117:     ct:pal("Opening first Textgroup session"),
  118:     Socket1 = connect(Config),
  119:     ct:pal("Opening second Textgroup session"),
  120:     Socket2 = connect(Config),
  121:     ok = recv_until(Socket1, <<"Peers may query your IP address">>),
  122:     ok = recv_until(Socket2, <<"Peers may query your IP address">>),
  123:     ct:pal("Sending messages over both sessions"),
  124:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket1, [<<"foo">>, $\n]),
  125:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket2, [<<"bar">>, $\n]),
  126:     ct:pal("Receiving messages over both sessions"),
  127:     ok = recv_until(Socket1, <<"bar">>),
  128:     ok = recv_until(Socket2, <<"foo">>),
  129:     ct:pal("Querying ~s from Textgroup server", [Query]),
  130:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket1, [Query, $\n]),
  131:     ok = recv_until(Socket1, Expected),
  132:     ct:pal("Closing first Textgroup session"),
  133:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket1, <<"quit", $\n>>),
  134:     ok = recv_until(Socket1, <<"Thanks for using Textgroup">>),
  135:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket1),
  136:     ct:pal("Closing second Textgroup session"),
  137:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket2, <<"quit", $\n>>),
  138:     ok = recv_until(Socket2, <<"Thanks for using Textgroup">>),
  139:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket2).
  140: 
  141: -spec recv_until(gen_tcp:socket(), binary()) -> ok.
  142: recv_until(Socket, Expected) ->
  143:     ct:pal("Expecting response: ~s", [Expected]),
  144:     {ok, Data} = gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, timer:seconds(5)),
  145:     Line = string:trim(Data),
  146:     case string:prefix(Line, Expected) of
  147:         nomatch ->
  148:             ct:pal("Didn't get expected response (yet): ~s", [Line]),
  149:             recv_until(Socket, Expected);
  150:         _Rest ->
  151:             ct:pal("Got expected response: ~s", [Line]),
  152:             ok
  153:     end.
